lines.text:
[kisses Ann, then blows out smoke]
What a kiss.

[blows out smoke]
What a Fuller Brush Man.

[as he sees Ann kissing Red, who he thinks is a murderer]
Arrest that man!
Why, is there a law against it?

[repeated line, about to knock Keenan Wallick out]
Sorry, Mr. Wallick!

[dazed after a door falls on him]
Good morning, Madam, would you like to buy a brush?
It's just as well, if I'd gone to another house, Dracula probably would've lived there.

[to a grandmother with a bratty child]
Here Grandma, a complimentary brush, sorry we don't have one with a nail in it.
Is there another way out of here?
Yeah, out that window, four floors straight down.
